Container.Name: scprime
Container.Overview:
ScPrime is a cryptocurrency project targeting public cloud services with a blockchain based ecosystem to pay individuals to store data around the globe using smart contracts and cryptographic proofs to ensure accuracy, security and redundancy.
**Note:** This docker container runs the ScPrime Xa-Miner Software (Basic version) used for operating a storage provider.
**Setup:** Command-line is required to configure your storage provider instance.
Open the Unraid terminal and enter: **docker exec -it scprime sh**
**Getting Started:** https://docs.scpri.me/diy-getting-started
**Storage Network Status:** https://scpri.me/network
**Join the Discord for Help (Recommended):** https://discord.gg/scprime
General docker installation help can be found in Discord: **#support-other**
Container.Requires:
A license key is required to operate a storage provider with full rights to receive data from Xa Net Services customers: https://docs.scpri.me/diy-getting-started/licensing-faq
Additionally, storage providers will need collateral to form contracts: https://docs.scpri.me/diy-getting-started/collateral

Config.Name: Metadata
Config.Description: Location where metadata is stored including consensus, wallets and file contracts. 100Gb of free space is recommended, SSD preferred.

Config.Name: Hosting Port
Config.Description: Open this port in your firewall and forward to your server.

Config.Name: Relayer Port
Config.Description: Open this port in your firewall and forward to your server.

Config.Name: Wallet Password
Config.Description: Enter your password to automatically unlock your wallet when the docker container starts. NOTE: Your default password is your seed phrase unless changed. WARNING: If you're using the Unraid My Servers plugin to backup your Flash drive, the backups will save to Unraid's cloud servers unencrypted, which includes the password entered into this field. Please make sure you understand the implications of this.

Config.Name: API Password
Config.Description: Create an optional API password, which is used when connecting outside of the container. Required if using with Supervisor-Lite add-on tool

Config.Name: Storage
Config.Description: Path where shared folders are located.
